mapper.select: select ca.id id, ca.code code, ca.name name, ca.description description, ca.creator_id creator_id, ca.modifier_id modifier_id, ca.date_created date_created, ca.date_modified date_modified, ca.data_status from sys_authority_tb ca where ca.data_status = 0 and exists ( select cmao.auth_id from sys_map_auth_opea_tb cmao where cmao.auth_id = ca.id )
select sagt.id id, sagt.name text, sagt.code code, 1 group_ from sys_authority_group_tb sagt where sagt.data_status = 0 and sagt.parent_id is null
select sagt.id id, sagt.name text, sagt.code code, 1 group_ from sys_authority_group_tb sagt where sagt.data_status = 0 and sagt.parent_id = #{groupId}

select sat.id id, sat.code code, sat.name text, 0 group_ from sys_authority_tb sat where exists ( select smaat.auth_id from sys_map_auth_authgroup_tb smaat where smaat.auth_id = sat.id and smaat.authgroup_id = #{groupId}) and sat.data_status = 0

select ca.id id, ca.code code, ca.name name, ca.description description, ca.creator_id creator_id, ca.modifier_id modifier_id, ca.date_created date_created, ca.date_modified date_modified, ca.data_status from sys_authority_tb ca
select sagt.id id, sagt.name text, sagt.code code, sagt.description description from sys_authority_tb sagt where sagt.data_status = 1
mapper.insert:
select sys_authority_seq.nextval as id from dual
insert into sys_authority_tb(ID,CODE,NAME,DESCRIPTION,CREATOR_ID,MODIFIER_ID,DATE_CREATED,DATE_MODIFIED,DATA_STATUS) values(#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{creator,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifier,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dateCreated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{dateUpdated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{dataStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: update sys_authority_tb set CODE=#{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR},NAME=#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},DESCRIPTION=#{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR},CREATOR_ID=#{creator,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, MODIFIER_ID=#{modifier,jdbcType=NUMERIC},DATE_CREATED=#{dateCreated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},DATE_MODIFIED=#{dateUpdated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},DATA_STATUS=#{dataStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where ID=#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select count(id) from sys_authority_tb where name=#{name}

select t1.id id, t1.code code, t1.name name, t1.description description, t1.creator_id creator_id, t1.modifier_id modifier_id, t1.date_created date_created, t1.date_modified date_modified, t1.data_status data_status, t3.id menu_id, t3.name menu_name, t5.id opea_id, t5.name opea_name from sys_authority_tb t1 left join sys_map_auth_menu_tb t2 on t2.auth_id=t1.id left join sys_menu_tb t3 on t2.menu_id=t3.id left join sys_map_auth_opea_tb t4 on t1.id=t4.auth_id left join sys_operation_tb t5 on t4.opea_id=t5.id where t1.id=#{id}
select t1.id id from sys_authority_tb t1
select count(id) from sys_authority_tb where code=#{code}
